id.title: id
id.description: A unique numeric identifier for the address.

customer_id.title: customer_id
customer_id.description: A unique numeric identifier for the customer.

address2.title: address2
address2.description: An additional field for the customer's mailing address.

province.title: province
province.description: The customer's province or state name.

zip.title: zip
zip.description: The customer's zip or postal code.

phone.title: phone
phone.description: The customer's phone number for this mailing address.

province_code.title: province_code
province_code.description: The code for the customer's province or state.

country_code.title: country_code
country_code.description: The two-letter country code corresponding to the customer's country.

default.title: default
default.description: Indicates whether this address is the default address for the customer. Valid values are true or false.

id.title: id
id.description: A unique numeric identifier for the customer.

email.title: email
email.description: The unique email address of the customer. Attempting to assign the same email address to multiple customers will return an error.

accepts_marketing.title: accepts_marketing
accepts_marketing.description: Indicates whether the customer has consented to be sent marketing material via email. Valid values are true or false.

created_at.title: created_at
created_at.description: The date and time when the customer was created. The API returns this value in ISO 8601 format.

updated_at.title: updated_at
updated_at.description: The date and time when the customer information was updated. The API returns this value in ISO 8601 format.

orders_count.title: orders_count
orders_count.description: The number of orders associated with this customer.

state.title: state
state.description: The state of the customer's account in a shop. The state can be changed in the shop admin or by the customer, but not through the API. Valid states are: disabled, invited, enabled, declined.

total_spent.title: total_spent
total_spent.description: The total amount of money that the customer has spent at the shop.

last_order_id.title: last_order_id
last_order_id.description: The id of the customer's last order.

verified_email.title: verified_email
verified_email.description: States whether or not the email address has been verified.

multipass_identifier.title: multipass_identifier
multipass_identifier.description: The customer's identifier used with Multipass login.

tax_exempt.title: tax_exempt
tax_exempt.description: Indicates whether the customer should be charged taxes when placing orders. Valid values are true or false.

phone.title: phone
phone.description: The unique phone number for this customer. Attempting to assign the same phone number to multiple customers will return an error. Valid formats can be of different types, but must represent a number that can be dialed from anywhere in the world. When returned by Shopify, the phone number will always be formatted according to the E.164 standard, e.g. `+16135551111`.

tags.title: tags
tags.description: Tags are additional short descriptors formatted as a string of comma-separated values. For example, if an article has three tags: tag1, tag2, tag3.

last_order_name.title: last_order_name
last_order_name.description: The name of the customer's last order. This is directly related to the Order's name field.

addresses.title: addresses
addresses.description: A list of the ten most recently updated addresses for the customer.

default_address.title: default_address
default_address.description: The default address for the customer.
